cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha.title: up_alpha
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha.description: Alpha features. Commands may be removed in future releases.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.title: up_alpha_migration
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.description: Migrate control planes to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.title: up_alpha_migration_export
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.description: The 'export' command is used to export the current state of a Crossplane or Universal Crossplane (xp/uxp) control plane into an archive file. This file can then be used for migration to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.title: up_alpha_migration_import
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.description: The 'import' command imports a control plane state from an archive file into an Upbound managed control plane.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.title: up_alpha_migration_pause-toggle
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_migratio.description: The 'pause-toggle' command is used to pause or unpause resources affected by a migration, ensuring that only migration-induced pauses are undone.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_bi.title: up_alpha_space_billing_export
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_bi.description: Export a billing report for submission to Upbound.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_co.title: up_alpha_space_connect_(attach)
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_co.description: Connect an Upbound Space to the Upbound web console.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_di.title: up_alpha_space_disconnect_(detach)
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_di.description: Disconnect an Upbound Space from the Upbound web console.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_li.title: up_alpha_space_list
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_li.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_mi.title: up_alpha_space_mirror
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_alpha_space_mi.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.

cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_composition_re.title: up_composition_render
cli/cli-reference/yaml/up_composition_re.description: Run a composition locally to render an XR into composed resources.
